long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds WiFi and internet information for Airbnb listings, and includes it on the page. Click on the WiFi icon to view all comments prior guests have left that talks about the internet. If icon does not light up, no comments exist.
